parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.04

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Detection

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Positions

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns units in group/array below given Above Terrain Level (ATL) height.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> unit's ATL height can be found with <template><title>ic</title><part><name index="1"/><value>_height <template><title>=</title></template> ([[getPosATL]] _unit) [[select]] 2;</value></part></template></value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> units [[unitsBelowHeight]] height

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> units: [[Array]] of [[Object]]s

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> height: [[Number]] - height above terrain level ([[PositionATL]])

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[Object]]s

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> group [[unitsBelowHeight]] height

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> group: [[Group]] - AI group

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> height: [[Number]] - height above terrain level ([[PositionATL]])

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] of [[Object]]s

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_allOnGroudUnits = [[group]] [[player]] [[unitsBelowHeight]] 10;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_units = [[allUnits]] [[unitsBelowHeight]] 30;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[allUnits]], [[getPosATL]], [[group]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
